com.github.hotware.lucene.extension.bean.type

Interface AnyClassType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockType.SerializeType

    public interface AnyClassType
extends Type
    Types that can handle all classes. All fields annotated with such a type will be passed through as the "raw" Object and not iterated upon.

    Single-layered Sets/Lists are already supported in { BeanConverterImpl and use Type for internal conversion. So don't use this interface for this.

    This can also be used for rudimentary hierarchical indexing of beans
    Author:
    Martin Braun

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hotware.lucene.extension.bean.type.Type

        configureFieldType
